overview: A business tycoon dreams of coming up with the lowest air fare flights so that any common man can afford to fly. Business partner's son Rahul is a spoiled brat who blames the tycoon for his father's demise. Rahul takes the advantage of that situation and demands for a huge money as a compensatory amount. Tycoon gets intimidated by Rahul on continuous basis he ends up in attempting suicide.
title: Prakatana
